name: Galactic Escape
description:
Fight through randomly generated levels!
Fight through multiple randomly generated levels with the help of the weapons and items you find in those levels. After fighting through all the levels you can loop through the same levels with a scaled up difficulty.


Equip yourself!
You can equip yourself with different weapons you find or buy in the levels. You can also find different items that give you different effects depending on the item.


Fight your way to victory!


Defeat bosses!
At the end of the level you open a portal but a boss stops you before you can, each level can spawn different bosses to make sure each run is different.
